data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Arhangay.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arhangay, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Arhangay, Mongolia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 115 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 730 believers in Arhangay to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Arhangay who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, 0.9% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Arhangay who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, please give your people in Arhangay, Mongolia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 84,600 souls living in the state of Arhangay with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

location.name: Arhangay
